author: dain
msg: Add a MAX_TX field so an array of tx flags can easily be built, but this should be turned into an enum

author: hlship
msg: Change the GridPager to "latch" the immediate page range around the upper and lower bounds of the available pages (this ensures that there are always at least 2 * range + 1 pages to select, even when on the first or last page of the set).

author: cutting
msg: Oops.  Accidentally added the notes for HADOOP-992 and HADOOP-954 to
the 0.11 branch section, when these changes are in trunk.  Fixed.

author: jboynes
msg: add interface for a classloader registry
